extracted_playbook.title: Determine Mitigation Path for CVE-2024-11166
extracted_playbook.description: Decide whether to upgrade to ACAS X or upgrade the associated transponder to comply with RTCA DO-181F to mitigate CVE-2024-11166.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which mitigation path is chosen for CVE-2024-11166?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to ACAS X
extracted_playbook.description: Perform the upgrade to ACAS X to fully mitigate CVE-2024-11166.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Transponder to Comply with RTCA DO-181F
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the associated transponder to comply with RTCA DO-181F to fully mitigate CVE-2024-11166.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Organizations should observe for any suspected malicious activity related to these vulnerabilities and follow established internal procedures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Findings to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Report any findings of suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
